content: घट्ट् {c1c} <ab>A.</ab> (घट्ट्ते) usually {c10c} <ab>U.</ab> (घदृयति-ते, घट्टित) {@--1@} To shake, stir about; as in वायुघट्टिता लताः. {@--2@} To touch, rub, rub the hands over; विटजननखघट्टितेव वीणा <ls>Mk. 1. 24</ls>; <ls>Bk. 14. 2.</ls> {@--3@} To smooth, stroke. {@--4@} To speak spitefully or malignantly. {@--5@} To disturb.
